Text:
can u make MP4 or MKV format?
is there any Dual Audio?

Yes ! Russian and Japanese.
YOU didn't actually think they would do any English audio did you ???

Thank you uploader.
For those who have problems enabling the subtitles. Make sure the output playback is set to VMR-7renderless in MPC. And the rename the SRT file to Backbone 2001.srt
